ygData.authorName: Fletcher, Neal L SGT 224 MI BN
ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 196
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been keeping ST memed and using it just about every time I fight something lately.   It stuns a creature for about 10-20 seconds.  Sometimes you can stack
ygData.messageBody:
I've been keeping ST memed and using it just about every time I fight
something lately. It stuns a creature for about 10-20 seconds. Sometimes
you can stack 2 DoT's, sometimes you barely have enough time to get darkness
off on them. Still it's great for fighting casters since it stops their
spells cold every time. I actually prefer it to Root now. Use ST, then
Darkness, then VoS if you can get it off, then use Invoke Fear, and you own
just about anything that doesn't resist the spells.

Subject: Screaming Terror-New effects

Thanks in advance!
Aazen Sy'Vex
